game.name: DCS: UH-1H Huey
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 캡션 이용 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원
game.shortDescription: The UH-1 Huey is one of the most iconic and recognizable helicopters in the world. Having served extensively as a transport and armed combat support helicopter in the Vietnam War, the Huey continues to perform a wide variety of military and civilian missions around the world today.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The UH-1 Huey is one of the most iconic and recognizable helicopters in the world. Having served extensively as a transport and armed combat support helicopter in the Vietnam War, the Huey continues to perform a wide variety of military and civilian missions around the world today.
